demo.project_desc: A landmark book about coffee from one of the most famous and innovative professionals of the industry.
demo.terms: …here will be an agreement on the parties’ rights…
demo.project_desc_1: All these years that I am in the coffee industry, I would like to find a manual that would give me all the necessary information about coffee, its origin, taste — generally, about everything that would prompt me to buy it. I would like to help people figure it out. Sharp popularization of coffee’s specialty did not give a clear understanding of this to an average consumer. People buy expensive coffee, brew it at home in special ways, pay a lot of money for a cup in coffee shops, but still do not understand the differences. In the coffee industry, everything has become so confusing now, and I want the book to clarify the situation a little.
demo.project_desc_3: Here you can pre-order the "World Atlas of Coffee" at a low price and contribute to the development of the coffee industry in the world. The more books will be ordered in this project, the greater the printing of the book will be published. So, the knowledge of the world of coffee from one of the leading professionals of the industry will become more accessible.
demo.project_desc_5: The "World Atlas of Coffee" invites the reader to a round-the-world journey into the world of coffee. You will learn all about its origins, the producing countries, and cultures, where coffee has become a way of life. Atlas will reveal the world experience of coffee consumption — ways of processing its beans and methods of brewing the drinks.
demo.project_desc_6: Plants of the Coffea genus are grown in more than 70 countries. The coffee belt covers equatorial Latin America, South East Asia and Africa. In Colombia, Ethiopia and Honduras, coffee has the first place in exports and is vitally important for the economies of those countries.
demo.project_desc_7: The "World Atlas of Coffee" is structured along three main aspects:
demo.project_desc_8: The way of coffee production — from a small coffee bean, thrown into the ground, to the harvested crop, processing, roasting and getting a ready-made drink.
demo.project_desc_9: The history of coffee consumption — the ways of its brewing, the special subtleties of the choice of grind and water.
demo.project_desc_10: Information about producers — the history of the coffee culture characteristic of each country, the organization of plantations, the method of beans processing and the flavor profile.
demo.product_2_desc: "World Atlas of Coffee" book with worldwide delivery.
demo.product_3_desc: "World Atlas of Coffee" book with worldwide delivery.
demo.product_4_desc: 10 "World Atlas of Coffee" books at a special wholesale price.

demo.news_title: $ 100,000 for the publication of the book has already been collected, but this is not the limit!
demo.news_desc: Friends, we have collected the first hundred thousand dollars! Thanks for the support! But it’s too early to stop! The pre-order for the book can be made until the very end of the project, and the more books will be ordered, the greater the printing of the book will be published. So, the knowledge of the world of coffee from one of the leading professionals of the industry will become more accessible! Tell about our project in social networks.
